name: Blake Belladonna (Season 1) | RWBY
description:
Resource used: https://civitai.com/models/22530
I'm now open to requests!

Your characters may have insufficient training data! Click here.

Weight: 1.0

Trigger: blake belladonna

She wears a black hair bow to hide her cat ears. (Don't put these prompts together.)

Default Outfit: sleeveless shirt, detached sleeve, pantyhose, legwear under white shorts

Add black hair and yellow eyes if necessary. Some of the training images are screencaps from RWBY: Ice Queendom.

Team RWBY:

  • Ruby Rose

  • Weiss Schnee

  • Blake Belladonna

  • Yang Xiao Long
